# hv-container

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                 | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Defines the component size. | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                         | Description                                   |
| ---------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `--hv-container-padding`     | Defines the container padding.                |
| `--hv-container-padding-lg`  | Defines the container padding on lg screens.  |
| `--hv-container-padding-md`  | Defines the container padding on md screens.  |
| `--hv-container-padding-sm`  | Defines the container padding on sm screens.  |
| `--hv-container-padding-xl`  | Defines the container padding on xl screens.  |
| `--hv-container-padding-xxl` | Defines the container padding on xxl screens. |
| `--hv-container-width-lg`    | Defines the container width on lg screens.    |
| `--hv-container-width-md`    | Defines the container width on md screens.    |
| `--hv-container-width-sm`    | Defines the container width on sm screens.    |
| `--hv-container-width-xl`    | Defines the container width on xl screens.    |
